org.apache.flink.api.java.record.functions

Class JoinFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.functions.JoinFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FlatJoinFunction<org.apache.flink.types.Record,org.apache.flink.types.Record,org.apache.flink.types.Record>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFunction

    public abstract class JoinFunction
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
implements org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FlatJoinFunction<org.apache.flink.types.Record,org.apache.flink.types.Record,org.apache.flink.types.Record>
    The JoinFunction must implementation by functions of a JoinOperator. It resembles an equality join of both inputs on their key fields.
